To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AverageTrueRange _atr;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_atr = ATR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_atr.IsReady)
{
    var trueRange = _atr.TrueRange.Current.Value;
    var current = _atr.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.atr = self.ATR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.atr.IsReady:
    true_range = self.atr.TrueRange.Current.Value
    current = self.atr.Current.Value
